message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 8-7-1, translated into en
data: This indicator corresponds to the global SDG target “8.7.1: Proportion and number of children aged 5 17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age”. The content of the Vietnamese and global indicators is the same, the method of collection is according to global standards (supported by the International Labor Organization-ILO). Therefore, Vietnam's data ensures international comparison.
